course_title: Professional Development II: Evidence-Based Nursing Practice
class_notes: This class is for DABSN Semester 2 students only. SESSION TWO: Mar. 14-May 6.
course_description: This course emphasizes the role of research in nursing and healthcare. Students are introduced to a variety of methods of inquiry and participate in learning activities to develop skills necessary to understand and apply research findings to clinical nursing practice.
sections: Class Nbr: 3853, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: F 1-5p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
